Source.Name: qalculate-gtk
Source.Summary: Qalculate! is a multi-purpose desktop calculator.
Source.Description: Qalculate! is a multi-purpose cross-platform desktop calculator. It is small and simple to use but with much power and versatility underneath. Features include customizable functions, units, arbitrary precision, plotting, and a user-friendly interface.
